basics.name: Like Zheng
basics.label: Software Engineer | Product Manager
basics.summary: 5 年的工作生涯中，前 3 年做的是软件工程，后 2 年主要是做产品经理，对于 UI 设计略知一二。业余时间会自己写写代码，尝试些新的技术。相较于后端，更加擅长前端开发，非常在意用户体验，这也是我为什么会去学习产品设计和 UI 设计的原因。注重团队协作，曾经从 0 到 1 建立了一个拥有敏捷文化的 6 人前端团队。

work.name: GreaterHeat Ltd.
work.summary: After the successful expansion of the company to Singapore, I shifted my focus to product and community management to improve the company's community influence, which included communicating with the Filecoin community and designing product prototypes.
highlights: Designed and developed a Filecoin Sealing-as-a-Service platform.
Published a weekly newsletter about Filecoin and IPFS within the company with over 100 views. Newsletter was issued for 9 weeks as of this resume update.

work.name: ByteArk Tech Ltd.
work.summary: Led a team focused on developing applications based on Filecoin and IPFS.
highlights: Managed a team of 5 people, including 2 Front-End Developers, 2 Back-End Developers, and 1 UI designer.
Build a cloud storage application based on Filecoin and IPFS.

work.name: Muri Tech Ltd.
work.summary: Started as a Senior Front-End Engineer and established Git usage guidelines and a design system. Successfully contributed to the team, leading to early regularization and promotion to Front-End Leader.
highlights: Led a team of 8 developers to develop and maintain web applications.
Refactored codebase to improve code quality, reduce technical debt, and increase site performance by 30%.
Established Git usage guidelines based on trunk-based development.
Developed the company's design system.

work.name: ByteArk Tech Ltd.
work.summary: Started as a Front-End Engineer and was promoted to Front-End Leader upon successful completion of the probation period. Spearheaded the establishment of the Front-End team, developing the team's development processes and standards.
highlights: Managed a team of 8 developers to develop web applications, mobile apps, and WeChat mini-programs.
Established the team's development processes and standards, including Git usage guidelines, code review guidelines, and design system.
Researched Agile development methodologies, implemented best practices to improve team performance, and produced over 10,000 words of documentation.

work.name: Ningbo Port Information and Communication Ltd.
work.summary: Efficiently developed and meticulously maintained a website for port declaration system using Java and ExtJS.
highlights: Improved developer experience by incorporating polyfills for IE11, increasing browser compatibility and enhancing functionality.

projects.name: Pandarua

projects.name: MePrint
